text:
Hi Guys,

Hope you are doing well.

I am new to HubSpot and want to learn web development.

After going through the out-of-the-box functionalities, I feel that to incorporate the custom design in HubSpot I need to create custom modules and use them on the website.
Please suggest if I have the wrong understanding.

For example, to create the following calculator on the website I need to create a calculator module and use it.

Please suggest to me which certification or courses I need to cover to have this skill (To create configurable modules in HubSpot).

Thanks :slightly_smiling_face:
